Installation¶

The required packages for using pyvttbl are:

  1. Python 3.x (test with 3.9.13)

  2. SciPy : (tested with 1.9.1)

  3. NumPy : (tested with 1.21.5)

  4. Matplotlib : (tested with 3.5.2)

Options to install pyvttbl

  1. Clone from github

    1. open terminal in site-packages directory

    2. run “git clone https://github.com/rogerlew/pyvttbl/”

To develop pyvttbl you should also have:

  1. pytest : (tested with 1.3.7)

  2. Sphinx : (tested with 5.0.2)
